changes: Removed Lithuanian-to-English mode entirely. App now works cleanly as English → Lithuanian.
Added manual Add Entry button on Home and Library for direct phrase creation.
Improved AddForm: sheet dropdown added, cleaner layout, stable editing.
Translation prompt simplified: 'What would you like to say?'
Translation API rebuilt. Cleaner EN→LT JSON pipeline with tone and listener gender handling.
LibraryView fully redesigned around single-direction audio playback.
Long-press slow audio + tap for normal audio standardised across the app.
Header and Settings cleaned and simplified for new architecture.
Removed all dead code related to direction, modes, and obsolete logic.
UI consistency improvements and foundations laid for future source-language selector.
